attributes.action: declare null and void any parliamentary vote with a majority of less than the number of scottish constituency MPs still occupying seats in the english House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our lame duck government is becoming more and more reliant upon the votes of the 40 or so scottish constituency MPs who continue fraudulently to occupy seats in the House of Commons.  It is imperative that any government measure which has a positive majority of less than forty (in favour or against) be considered flawed and treated as a no vote because without the 40 scottish constituency MPs, the vote would have gone the other way.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
